SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractStatistics
Abstract base class for statistics collection implementations.
AppConfig
Represents the final, validated application configuration.
AppConfigBuilder
A builder class that converts RawCommandLineArgs into a validated AppConfig.
AppException
Base exception class for all application-specific exceptions.
CommandLineArgsParser
A utility class for parsing command line arguments into a structured format.
CompositeStatistics
A composite statistics collector that manages multiple type-specific statistics collectors.
ConfigurationException
Thrown when application configuration is invalid or inconsistent.
DoubleStatistics
Statistics collector for double-precision floating-point values.
FileProcessor
A service class for processing files containing different data types.
FileWriteException
Thrown when file writing operations fail.
FileWriter
A concurrent file writer that asynchronously writes different data types to separate files.
IntegerStatistics
Statistics collector for integer (long) numeric values.
IOExceptionWithPath
Base exception for I/O operations failures with file path context.
NonNumericValueException
Thrown when a non-numeric value is provided where a numeric value is expected.
NonStringValueException
Thrown when a non-string value is provided where a string value is expected.
NumberParseException
Thrown when numeric value parsing fails.
NumericStatistics
Abstract base class for numeric statistics implementations.
PathBuilder
A utility class for constructing file paths relative to the application's workspace.
RawCommandLineArgs
Represents raw command-line arguments parsed into a structured format.
Runner
 
Statistics
Interface for collecting and reporting statistics on values of various types.
StringStatistics
Statistics collector for string values.
